oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Four-Point, 2D, Free-Ranging, IMSPE-Optimal, Twin-Point Designs
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Crary, Selden
Stormann, Jan
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Statistics - Methodology
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We report the discovery of a set of four-point, two-factor, free-ranging, putatively IMSPE-optimal designs with a pair of twin points, in the statistical design of computer experiments, under Gaussian-process, fixed-Gaussian-covariance parameter, and zero-nugget assumptions. We conjecture this is the set of free-ranging, twin-point designs with the smallest number of degrees of freedom.
